We are to be kind and courteous to all, but especially are we to be pitiful and tender toward the unfortunate, as are the African race. God calls upon Christians, high or low, to represent Christ in their treatment of the colored people. God calls for His workers to consecrate themselves to 


                                    -14- 

the cause of justice and reform. . . . Let the colored people be treated as human beings. Let them be uplifted. The youth should be educated to become missionaries among their own people. . . .
